EmailTemplate.name: DELETION - Inform customer contact details deleted - For leads (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont privacy request - Deletion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer, We have received your request for the deletion of the personal information that DuPont has concerning you.
Be advised that your personal information has been deleted from our database(s).
For further queries and assistance, please contact us using the details provided below.
Sincerely,
DuPont Product Information Service - EMEA
Du Pont de Nemours International S.A.
Tel. +800 3876 6838
Fax:0034912725237
